entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
